insights.populationGrowth: Stable at 0.4% due to tourism development around Lake Khovsgol balancing outmigration.
insights.educationLevel: Good education 81% literacy. Tourism sector provides diverse training opportunities.

insights.temperature: Northern mountain climate, winters (-32°C), summers (25°C). Lake Khovsgol moderates temperatures.
insights.precipitation: Higher precipitation 320mm with lake effects. Best water resources in Mongolia.
insights.seasonality: Long winter, brief summer tourism season, spectacular autumn colors.
insights.extremeEvents: Moderate dzud, forest fires, lake level changes, tourism weather impacts.

economicProfile.businessEnvironment: Growing eco-tourism sector around pristine Lake Khovsgol, sustainable development focus
